definition: to recover (lost property or money)/to win back
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: This thing but proof of red of You Yanguo prince, adjure a help I am chased after return this debt.
sentences.chinese: 這件事可由燕國太子丹證明，懇請幫助我追還這筆債。

sentences.english: If there are big pay-offs, Congress could decide to claw back the benefits.
sentences.chinese: 如果有大額收益，國會可以做出決定追還這些收益。
